table_caption: Associations between AQP4 SNPs and longitudinal glymphatic imaging markers change.
table_foot: Note: Reported are estimates and p‐values from linear mixed models with random intercepts and random slopes. The fixed effect of SNP*time was interpreted as the effect on longitudinal glymphatic change.Abbreviations: All, the whole group; A−, Aβ negative; A+, Aβ positive; DTI‐ALPS, diffusion tensor image analysis along the perivascular space; FW, free water; MD, mean diffusivity; SNP, single‐nucleotide polymorphism; VRFs, vascular risk factor score; WM, white matter.
